title: Cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource
description: The bug report is missing the description of the issue. However, based on the provided OB, EB, and SR sections, it seems that there is a synchronization problem between a .java file and another resource (such as a .properties file) in the package viewer.
OB: When attempting to synchronize a .java file and another resource (such as a .properties file) in the package viewer, the synchronization process does not work as expected.
EB: The synchronization process between a .java file and another resource should work properly, ensuring that changes made in one file are reflected in the other.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. In the package viewer, select a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file).
